parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
From the base of histemi; a standing, i.e. position; by implication, a popular uprising; figuratively, controversy.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A city, the inhabitants of a city. Probably from the same as polemos, or perhaps from polus; a town.
Murder, slaughter, killing. From an obsolete primary pheno; murder.
